ComicInfo.Summary:
Snake's adventure in Siberia comes to a dramatic conclusion as he takes on the strange masked figure from his past.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Henderson (a) & Adam Guzowski (c) | 1 | Reg | Regular Cover | Robert Sammelin | 2 | Var | 1:25 Variant Cover | Trevor Hairsine | 3 | Note: The digital edition (7/22/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
